title: Young mom of newborn twins vanishes after night out with girlfriends, mystery ping & disturbing video emerge
itunes:title: Young mom of newborn twins vanishes after night out with girlfriends, mystery ping & disturbing video emerge
description:
Kentucky mom Savannah Spurlock vanished after going out with friends to a Lexington bar a month ago. Security camera video shows the mother of infant twins with two men who police have now interviewed. Toney Wade, commander of Cajun Coast Search and Rescue, is in Kentucky with volunteers and tracking dogs helping search for Spurlock. He joins Nancy Grace in this episode. Also in the discussion are Atlanta juvenile judge and lawyer Ashley Willcott, former detective Steven Lampley, psychologist Caryn Stark, syndicated radio host David Mack.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
